derivation: a prolonged form of G3415 (μιμνήσκω) (from which some of the tenses are borrowed);
strongs_def: to remind, i.e. (middle voice) to recall to mind
outline:
1. to remind
    1. to be recalled or to return to one's mind, to remind one's self of, to remember
    2. to be recalled to mind, to be remembered, had in remembrance
    3. to remember a thing
    4. be mindful of
